item.title: Man found guilty of child porn because he ran a Tor exit node
item.description: - William Weber, a member of the LowEndTalk community, is found guilty of supporting the transfer of underage pornography because he ran a Tor exit node.

item.title: All foster kids in California can now attend any state college for free
item.description: - Children and teens in foster care in California can now attend state and community colleges for free under new legislation.

item.title: Llama2.c: Inference llama 2 in one file of pure C
item.description: - A new code allows the inference of a Llama 2 model in pure C, providing a simple and minimal approach.

item.title: Icon Buddy – 100K+ Open Source SVG Icons, Fully Customizable
item.description: - Icon Buddy is a website that offers over 100,000 open-source icons that can be customized and edited.

item.title: Toyota has been developing a solid-state battery for EVs with a range of 745mi
item.description: - Toyota has been developing a solid-state battery for electric vehicles (EVs) with a range of 745 miles and a charge time of 10 minutes, which could revolutionize the industry.

item.title: I found an IT job thanks to this blog
item.description: - The author of the blog post shares their experience of how they landed a job in the IT industry through networking and showcasing their skills and passion.

item.title: Show HN: I made a MailChimp alternative that connects to your database
item.description: - cc.dev is a MailChimp alternative that allows you to connect your database and target your audience directly using SQL queries.

item.title: Simple Sabotage Field Manual – How to Destroy Your Organizations
item.description: - The Simple Sabotage Field Manual was a guide created by the OSS during WWII to train individuals in German-occupied territories how to sabotage their workplaces and hinder the German war effort.

item.title: A Romanian economist legally gamed the lottery
item.description: - A Romanian economist named Stefan Mandel developed a system to legally "game" the lottery by buying every possible combination, allowing him to win multiple jackpots and smaller prizes.

item.title: Show HN: I made a customizable iOS browser for minimalists & myself
item.description: - Quiche Browser is a customizable web browser for iPhone that lets users personalize their browsing experience.
